column3: GO.  Even with all the amazing food spots that Chicago has to offer
column4: this has become my absolute favorite.  The ambiance is like an old time speak easy
column5: and the cocktails match the decor - phenomenal.  Definitely get the duck terrine...it's too good for words.  Also
column6: the wedge salad.  It's a SLAB of pork belly.  Holy Hell.  Of course
column8: and the sides are delish. I loved the brussel sprouts
column11: it was a little cream heavy for me).  Service is always outstanding.  This is place is 100% worth the hype and the wait list.
